name: raycast-1password-otp-extension
title: 1Password OTP
author: jussi.vesa@gmail.com
description: Raycast extension to fetch One-Time Passwords (OTPs) from 1Password CLI using user-configured label/reference pairs.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

commands.name: get-otp
commands.title: Get OTP
commands.subtitle: Copy or Paste One-Time Password
commands.description: Select a configured label and copy/paste its OTP

commands.name: manage-otp-pairs
commands.title: Manage OTP Pairs
commands.subtitle: Add, Edit, Delete
commands.description: Manage label/reference pairs for OTP retrieval

preferences.name: otp_pairs_seed
preferences.title: Seed OTP Pairs (optional)
preferences.placeholder: JSON array of { label, ref } or lines: Label = op://.../field?attribute=otp
preferences.description: Initial pairs seed. Accepts JSON array of { label, ref } or line-based format where each line is 'Label = op://.../field?attribute=otp'. Used only if no pairs are stored yet.

preferences.name: op_path
preferences.title: 1Password CLI Path (optional)
preferences.description: Optional. Absolute path to the 'op' binary if Raycast can't find it in PATH (e.g., /opt/homebrew/bin/op or /usr/local/bin/op).
